description:
We learn how to make a wonderful Christmas gifts with the wishes. Very personal, very original and handmade gift for 15-20 minutes.We show how to make an edible gifts that does not need to cook.

You'll get the 6 independent video lessons with 15-20 minutes each. Each lesson shows how to make from 1 to 3 of the original gifts, united by a common creative idea. The total length of the course is 1 hour 42 minutes. A detailed list of the necessary materials and tools you'll find in every lesson.

Requires no experience to learn how to make these gifts. You may be a novice in "handmade"!

And when the Christmas comes... Give the gift to your friend and tell him: "It's a Christmas magic! - Make a wish and eat this gift to wish come true!" :)
title: Magic Personal Christmas Gifts with Wishes
